subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Derek Anderson threw five touchdown passes and Jamal Lewis rushed for 215 yards to lead the Browns over the Bengals. Cincinnati’s Carson Palmer tossed a career-high six TDs in the loss.
snippet: Derek Anderson threw five touchdown passes and Jamal Lewis rushed for 215 yards to lead the Browns over the Bengals. Cincinnati’s Carson Palmer tossed a career-high six TDs in the loss.
